Ref: CXP064/2023

To provide Control and Operational support to the Steel Division, being responsible for the daily transactions within the division, as well direct liaison with Customers and suppliers.

Criteria:
Matric and Relevant Tertiary Qualification (min. Supply Chain Degree)
2 Years related experience
Sales and Marketing; Shipping, Clearing & Forwarding experience
Drivers License & Own Vehicle
Computer Literacy: Intermediate MS Office, SAP

Apply via website or Alternatively via: https://forms.gle/8mRbBqpY1WY7fSPs7
